Row.Text: A famine in our lands
We have angered the gods through our actions, and they have condemned Egypt to an age of famine! We must find a way to put an end to their wrath, or the support of our dynasty will collapse.[NEWLINE]
We must regain the favour of the gods! Praise Serapis!
We must save as much food as we can! Egypt will persevere this.
Let the people suffer. They should know their wrongdoings!
